title: Add hello world test file
description:
Create a simple test file at internal/testutil/hello.go with a Hello function that returns 'Hello, World!' and a test file hello_test.go with TestHello.

Test: go test ./internal/testutil/...
closed_reason: Created internal/testutil/hello.go with Hello() function returning 'Hello, World\!' and hello_test.go with TestHello. All tests pass.
